title: Tern Clubhouse Fort Mini offers single-seat protection from the elements, plus Doghouse Mini & more!
content:
Tern has dedicated ten years of operation to get people out of cars and onto bikes for daily commutes and errands.Â  But even die-hard commuters struggle with how to live life on two wheels when the weather gets rough or when they need to bring along kids or animals.
